commits.title: Add commit decider
commits.body: Implements a python file of an agent system that automatically commits
per_file_changes: python file of the agent system

commits.title: Add error handling for failed logins
commits.body: Handles invalid credentials gracefully and returns proper HTTP status codes.
per_file_changes: Add try-except block for credential validation

branches.name: feature/user-profile
branches.rationale: Adds user profile management including edit and view endpoints.
risk_notes: Data consistency between profile updates and cached info

commits.title: Create user profile model
commits.body: Defines Profile ORM model and database migration.
per_file_changes: Create initial migration for profile table

commits.title: Add profile edit and view endpoints
commits.body: Implements GET and PUT routes for user profile management.
per_file_changes: Add profile view and edit handlers
